frame.name: FR_Deciding
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> acquires the opinion that a certain situation (the <fen>Decision</fen>) should or should not hold (depending on the LUs). The <fen>Decision</fen> can be an action that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> will or will not perform or have performed by someone else. The <fen>Decision</fen> may concern a <fen>Topic</fen>.
<ex></ex> Distinctions with other frames:
<ex> ≠ <frframe>FR_Purpose</frframe>: FR_Deciding's Cognizer is not necessarily the one supposed to perform the decided action, whereas with FR_Purpose, the Goal necessarily involves the Cognizer. In cases in which the Cognizer is the one who will perform the decided action: the FR_Deciding frame is inchoative of most triggers in the FR_Purpose frame: once a Deciding event has taken place, its Decision role becomes the Goal of FR_Purpose.</ex>
<ex> ≠ Choosing: the Choosing frame is evoked by LUs whose meaning includes the idea of a set of possibilities among which an option is selected. Further, the content of the decision is more restricted than a choice, which can be among a set of entities of any kind.</ex>
<ex></ex> <asf>Relation to fndata-1.5</asf> : derived from Deciding to which has been added a core role (Topic). The relation to the Choosing fndata-1.5 frame is removed, as in FR_Decision, the decision is not overtly among a set of options, further, the content of the decision is more restricted than a choice, which can be among a set of entities of any kind.
<ex></ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> decides on a course of action, be it for themselves or someone they have authority on.
<ex><fex name="Cog">Mo</fex> <t>decided</t> to quit the program.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Decision
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Decision</fen> identifies the entity or course of upon which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> decides, be it for themselves or someone they have authority on. <ex>Mo <t>decided</t> <fex name="Dec">to quit the program</fex>.</ex> <ex>FR-EX: Il n'a pas été <t>décidé</t> que <fex name="Dec">l'état d'urgence serait prolongé</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Topic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Topic</fen> is the entity that a <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes a decision about. <ex>FR-EX: Il appartiendra ensuite au conseil de prendre une <t>décision</t> définitive sur <fex name="Top">la faisabilité du projet</fex>.</ex> <ex>FR-EX: Le conseil doit <t>décider</t> si <fex name="Top">le projet est faisable</fex>.</ex> <ex>FR-EX: Le conseil doit <t>décider</t> de <fex name="Top">la faisabilité du projet</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Medium
FE.definition: <def-root>The written or spoken material that contains the decision. </def-root>
